column6: Conclusion regarding service delivery- (Time, Quality, Quantity, Cost, Functionality)

column3: Completion of the URF office building
column5: i. At the time of inspection the building had been completed and occupied. ii. Level 6 of the building which houses a conference facility was not in use at the time of audit because it was not furnished. iii. Mezzanine floor houses a gym and day care facility. However, the day care centre was not in use at the time of audit because it was not furnished. iv. Ground Floor houses a training room but it was not in use at the time of audit because it was not furnished.
column6: The anticipated services from the level 6, mezzanine floor and Ground floor were not being achieved due to their non- functionality.
